name: sliced in soup
title: Felix Soup · sliced in soup · fish

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition:Meat and meat ingredients, vegetable protein extracts, fish and fish derivatives (including cod), amino-acids, thickeners, minerals, derivatives of vegetable origin, various sugars, yeasts.Composition:Meat and animal derivatives, vegetable protein extracts, fish and fish derivatives (cod 4%), minerals, derivatives of vegetable origin, various sugars, yeasts.Composition:Meat and animal derivatives, vegetable protein extracts, fish and fish derivatives (tuna 4%), minerals, derivatives of vegetable origin, various sugars, yeasts.Composition:Meat and animal derivatives, vegetable protein extracts, fish and fish derivatives (plaice 4%), minerals, derivatives of vegetable origin, various sugars, yeasts.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: For a 4 kg cat, pour in a bowl and serve one pouch per day as a complement to other complete products from Purina. For your cat’s health, please respect the feeding guide.Serve at room temperature. Always provide clean and fresh water.This product is a complementary meal with a high moisture content: part of your cat’s daily water recommended intake will be supplied through the consumption of this product.Fresh clean drinking water should be always available.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complementary pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.
